org.libav.avutil.bridge

Class AVOptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.avutil.bridge.AVOptionHandler

  • public class AVOptionHandler
extends Object
    Convenience class to work with AVOption structs.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka
